Body: Description: Initial situation: A USB storage device was whitelisted locally on a computer. However, whitelisting is not functional. Workaround implemented: The USB storage device was deleted from the device list. Delete time: Monday morning, February 24, 2025. Whitelisting was done manually via Adding New Device (VID, PID, Serial Number) and is now functional! --> see screenshot "MMUC1050156_USB Storage Device_whitelisted.jpg". Whitelisting time: Tuesday morning, February 25, 2025. Issue: Since then, the deleted USB storage device no longer appears in the device list! The USB storage device is, however, displayed in the Logs Report. --> see logfiles "EP_Reporting_and_Administration_Tool_USB_Storage_Device_20D11E8010C1.xlsx". Question: Do devices that have been deleted from the list generally no longer appear in the device list? Expectation: Please check why the USB storage device is not listed in the device list. Please make sure that deleted devices are listed again. Thank you for your support.

What We've Learned Updated: - issue could not be reproduced by QA
- Dev intervention required to clear the database tables (possible solution)
Next Steps Updated: - schedule troubleshooting session with the designated developer for this issue
Discussed with @Andrei Pop​ as I will be out tomorrow regarding health issues, he will set up a remote session at that time with Mihaela Benta, Daniel Suciu and Pavel Mititelu.

What We've Learned Updated: Found the device was not connected to a computer after fixing the issue.
--------------
- issue could not be reproduced by QA
- Dev intervention required to clear the database tables (possible solution)

Next Steps Updated: Asked the customer to connect the device and confirm if the device is visible.
-------------
- schedule troubleshooting session with the designated developer for this issue

What We've Learned Updated: Found device 10EC | 5261 | 00000001004CE00000  has a right assigned before 6th or March.
---
Found the device was not connected to a computer after fixing the issue.
--------------
- issue could not be reproduced by QA
- Dev intervention required to clear the database tables (possible solution)

Next Steps Updated: Asked the customer to remove the rights from the 10EC | 5261 | 00000001004CE00000  device then reasigne them only if the last see time is more that 6th March 
------
Asked the customer to connect the device and confirm if the device is visible.
-------------
- schedule troubleshooting session with the designated developer for this issue
